long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
- How it works -
Need a fast dose of inspiration right in your web browser? This extension allows you to quickly access an inspirational quote by simply opening a new tab.

It's that easy! Just install the extension, open a new tab in your Chrome browser, and enjoy a fresh inspirational quote every day!

- Permissions -

Like any other extension, Dailybrighter needs certain permissions to function properly:


"Replace the page that you see when opening a new tab": We will update your new tab page so that you can easily search with Dailybrighter every time you open a new tab.
"Read a list of your most frequented websites": The extension needs this permission to display your most frequently visited sites on the new tab page.
"Change your search settings to Search.Dailybrighter.": We will use this permission to update your default search to Dailybrighter
